website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that should be considered only by those Phantom owners who held onto the original protective case that shipped with their quad.
pros: Designed to hold a Phantom 3 or 4 in its original protective case
Large enough to also accommodate a tablet and accessories
cons: If you don't have the OEM case that the drone came in, this offers little protection
Some reports of poor quality seams that easily rip

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I bought this even though I have the big 12” I pad pro and was afraid it would not fit. It does, I just put it under the cover and over the foam case. The top pocket I used for my triple charger, now I use it for my VR goggles, the headband ticks into the front pocket ok. This is a great deal, I had to pull up the invoice when the sales guy at Best Buy tried to sell me a really poor quality bag for $150.00+ and refused to believe my when I told him about this one!
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good compromise, works, decent build.
customer_reviews.text: This pack fits the stock Phantom 4 Pro + box perfectly, the only down side is that the extra compartment has "sewn in" dividers sewn in on one side, and I wished they were not so that I can remove them to install other accessories besides battery packs. Its dooable, with a pair of scissors. the build of this bag is middle of the road. The fact that you utilize the hard box that ships with the Drone is the best feature. Great for 100% secure protection of the drone. I put this entire package, backpack and drone box into a Hard shell case when shipping via airlines.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: So convenient, it might replace your more expensive hard case!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got the Case Club Waterproof Compact case for my P4P. Then this backpack went on sale, and I've never put my Phantom back in the expensive case! I can carry both as a carryon (fit in overhead bin) on the plane, but when I get where I'm going, I can also put this one on my back! I may still use the waterproof case on canoe trips or something, but this is my go-to method for transporting the P4P for sure. The material doesn't seem that rugged, but so far the workmanship is great - no signs of wear or defects, and I've lugged it around quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great pack for the Phantom 4 series - you just place the original Styrofoam case the Phantom came in into the pack and you are all set. There is an adjustable foam/Velcro divider included for the top pocket for extra batteries. Props go in the side pocket and there is a pocket on the very back for a tablet/phone. Pack is very comfortable to wear, has both shoulder and a belt strep. With the Phantom 4 case inside it also will stand upright on its own. For the price on this one you cannot beat it, works for me both as a regular storage pack and for transport when I am hiking to an area to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality and Tears Easily
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this because it was cheap. I’ve used it once and heard it tearing while I was carryin my P4. I had the usual drone, charger, all in the case with 3 extra batteries and my iPad mini. I wish people review it after they used it on the field not only when they’ve just packed their drone in it. Seems perfect since it fits everything but poorly made and if you’re not cautious can damage your drone. Straps are starting to rip off on day one with everything else
customer_reviews.author: cybernerdz

customer_reviews.title: It's an empty backpack only. No phone or any other structural material.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, why would you market a backpack for quads but not include foam or something of that matter. I purchased for a DJI phantom 3 standard which was packaged in cheap cardboard. When the bag showed up, it was flat. And that's when I realized they wanted you to use the phone from your original box inside this pack. I'm baffled. How is that a thing? I'm not sure what the other Phantoms come in from the manufacturer, but I'm pretty sure I wouldn't want to use that either. Why bother? I went with a HUL which turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: mr. moe

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Does What It Is Supposed To.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at several options for lugging my Phantom around, and saw this bag. And I thought, what better carrying device than the container the drone came in. And then I realized this is a bag for that box, and my problem was solved. The bag is well made, the material seems high quality, and the phantom box fits nice and snug. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this. For the propellers, I actually put those in the very top pocket, not the side ones.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced - basically a nylon bag.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this backpack I expected it to be a sturdy construction with firm dividers and pockets. It really was neither. It is basically a nylon bag which in fact was folded up into a small plastic bag when it arrived. This product should really be priced around $20. The phantom 4 pro fit into the bag nicely but you need to pull it around the styrofoam case the P4Pro came in like a skin. The pockets for batteries at the top are just Velcro dividers and do not firmly hold the batteries. It is fine for what it is but again, I feel it is overpriced (as many of these bags/backpacks are).
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Lambert

customer_reviews.title: New backpack for a broken buckle
customer_reviews.text: Loved the backpack!...until the plastic shoulder strap buckle broke and I couldn’t contact Smatree about replacing. Had to settle for buying a new backpack even though I had a perfectly good one otherwise that couldn’t be used because of the broken shoulder strap buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Noiceguy

customer_reviews.title: This is what you want for your P4 Pro/Advanced
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, good value. Well made. I only do reviews for products that I like. This is well made, zippers and fabric are sturdy, not cheap and flimsy. Loads of storage...side pouches, front pouch. Easily load all your gear up and easy to transport, + looks good too. This could go on an airplane as a carry on, or personal backpack. Win. Just get it. The cheaper alternatives, are just that. Too cheap and will more than likely not hold up to use.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it's just past the return window
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it gently for a month and the seams are coming apart. Too bad it's just past the return window :(
customer_reviews.author: Shefele

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - extra exterior battery/misc. pouches nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit for Phantom 4 Pro. love the 3 battery spots on outer part of case where I do not have to open main top to use. Only one little complaint is I wish the carry handle was a bit thicker and stronger. (alternative is grab by shoulder strap) I keep my props inside main case and not in side pouch for higher protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great way to utilize the foam case that the P4P ships in. Durable so far but I dont think it is intended for severe duty. Room for 4 batteries plus the two spots in the factory foam case. I use the side pockets for extra propellers, cables, pens etc. The large front pocket easily fits a sun shield for the screen and car charger. For the price, I can't imagine a better solution for ease of transport and storage.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperAR

customer_reviews.title: The the product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product was suppose to look like its picture an have the insert to hold the phantom 4 drone. It doesn’t have that and nothing more than a regular backpack. Returned next day
customer_reviews.author: Great

customer_reviews.title: Durability and service
customer_reviews.text: I only wish that this backpack had more storage because they have so many extra parts and pieces that you would like to take with you just in case. So by adding some more storage space would be really awesome other than that this is a very very good backpack I enjoy it very much and will if ever I need Second one I would definitely get this but still on the search for more storage space.
customer_reviews.author: RCP film studios

customer_reviews.title: This will fit on aircraft as a carry on luggage!  It just meets the requirements!
customer_reviews.text: I was in a bind trying to figure out how to get my drone on board with me. This case works fantastic although you do need to get the special LiPo contaiment bags for the batteries and they will fit in this case as well. The bag is well designed and has a lot of thought in its design! Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Smarttree Backpack for my P4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: The size is good, I like that you can keep the batteries separate from the drone. I cut out the sections, easier to fit 4 batteries without them. I wish there was a compartment for my hoodman hood. I keep it on top of the drone case between the outer part. I wish the outer compartment was bigger to hold the hoodman and my ipad mini. The quality seems to be good so far. I purchased an inexpensive one, lasted about a year. I keep my fifth battery in one of the outer mesh compartments. I usually hike a bit to where I fly, so the backpack is the way to go for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is more impressive in person than the pictures. DJI case fits perfectly and feels well made. The extra pockets. (On both sides and the iPad/tablet storage) are perfect. I have been out with it several times on short trips (less than .25 miles) from my vehicle and it is comfortable. It is a little tricky getting the top storage in place but it holds in place once put together.
customer_reviews.author: ppdjs725

customer_reviews.title: Easy to separate out the batteries while going through security ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for a trip to Kauai. I needed something that I could carry through security, and use while hiking around the island. The backpack seems to be of high quality. Easy to separate out the batteries while going through security at the airport. Held the original case snug, and has additional space for other items while backpacking with the drone. Backpack was comfortable, and even had a waste belt. I Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Phantom 4 owner

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I can fit 5 phantom 4 batteries, 2 changing cords, drone, controller, and misc items. great for taking on trails and great for transporting phantom 4 and accessories. I dont do extensive hiking with it, but you could. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim LeBeau

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on drone bags for the Phantom 4 Pro before deciding on this one. I truly love this bag. The fact that I can keep the drone in its OEM case and just insert into this bag is genius. I also love the fact that the top section has dividers to keep the batteries separated. I highly recommend this bag for anyone searching for a well designed travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: TheLink

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. Clever design.
customer_reviews.text: The DJI Phantom 4 Pro "Silver Foam" case fits perfectly into this bag, with room for batteries, tablet -- just as advertised. There is a little flap to access the foam case/s twist latch. Clever design. Everything seems great. Have not had a chance to field-test yet, as our sub-zero temps have not allowed drone flights yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great DJI Drone Backpack!  Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is as advertised! The styrofoam DJI Phantom 4 container fits perfectly and the additional storage is right on! The backpack appears to be well made (I have not yet taken it out), sturdy and padding appears very comfortable. I searched several other options and this one is the most cost effective (by far) and very secure for my drone and components.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, well executed. Only issue is that the separators in the top battery section are sewn in. Would prefer velcro inserts to adjust to space for othee items.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Hounshell

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This backpack did exactly what is advertised it would. My Phantom pro DJI Case fit perfectly with plenty of room for extra batteries and props and anything else you might need to take when you fly your Phantom Pro. It is very similar to the case that comes with the Yuneec Typhoon H Pro. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Karle

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell ut...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really put this through any torture testing, so these are just first impressions.... Hey - it does what it sets out to do!. The case fits snugly. The upper auxiliary compartment is snug for batteries, but also well padded.... I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: perfect case for the P4P - add a great price and you have a winner
customer_reviews.text: I love the case that came with my P4P, but it was a little tight for 3 batteries, extra props, a car charger, and a multi-battery charge deck...this is perfect. I can still bring my case, the pack is durable, roomy and to top it off, it is priced perfectly. great ob smatree.
customer_reviews.author: jaramatam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Backpack tore in less than 2 weeks. Could be a manufacturing flaw. Other than that the design is great
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Very good backpack shell for your Styrofoam case that comes with the P4P. Straps are comfortable, I like that there's water bottle holder. There's not a lot of extra space, just a pouch on the top and on the front, but that's enough to carry most of what you need.
customer_reviews.author: DKP

customer_reviews.title: Great product and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove... I think I'm really going to like it also fits on your back very well but it could've had a cross strap between the shoulder straps, my shoulders aren't that big, I could see it slipping off my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. X

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This has good room for extra batteries and fits the DJI case great. It also looks sleek and nice and not like a geeky backpack.
customer_reviews.author: David Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Functional, and made from decent quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Works well with DJI Phantom 4 Pro foam factory provided case (integrates into backpack). Nice to have storage for four additional batteries beyond the two that one can carry in the foam case. Store my iPad mini in the from pouch and blades in the side pockets (two zipper & two expandable mesh). I find it comfortable to wear as well.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect case for me. It fits everything I need to fly and is functional for the transport. This is NOT a travel case to check at the airlines, but, it is perfect for my truck carries and then into the field as a back pack.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: ... couple of months now and it is holding up nicely. The Phantom 4 insert fits perfectly and there ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag for a couple of months now and it is holding up nicely. The Phantom 4 insert fits perfectly and there is additional storage for extra batteries, a water bottle, an ipad mini or phone etc. I am very happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: no1cane

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for Phantom 4 owners adds a lot of storage and turns the foam cube into a really nice pack
customer_reviews.author: PJH

customer_reviews.title: The Phantom 4 comes with a good carrying case already
customer_reviews.text: This bag is hard to find, but it is well worth the wait. The Phantom 4 comes with a good carrying case already, why pay more for a case when you already have one? I would buy this product again and I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick D.

customer_reviews.title: Another great purchase!  Drone is safe and secure!
customer_reviews.text: Solid pack! Fits my drone and accessories perfectly and snug. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Scott Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. It carries everything for the drone except ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. It carries everything for the drone except the goggles and has space for extra batteries. The foam case the drone comes in slides inside and the cover opens with the foam case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for P4P and a lot of space. Plus a back pack--what more could you want.
customer_reviews.author: Luckie

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: fits everything I have. deffinitely worth the purchase. fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: vincent228

customer_reviews.title: Great way to carry my P4P Pro
customer_reviews.text: Great way to carry my P4P Pro. A bit bulky but it's worth it to me to carry for a powerful drone!
customer_reviews.author: Ray M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: DJI backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical until i received the backpack. It fits everything perfectly and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phantom 4 Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I received the back pack and love it. Works great for my Phantom 4. Looks so professional too.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for getting off the main grid
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for getting off the main grid, fits everything I need, padded in the right places, well thought out. Finish is good, stitching seems strong, I’m very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tilbury

customer_reviews.title: Convenience at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to be able to carry the drone safely.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barbery

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decently made worth of money
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a nice case does have some extra storage for batteries cords etc. pretty well-made worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great value..
customer_reviews.text: Just received pack. Put my DJI Phantom 4 and all accessories and still have room. Quality seems great and will work well to carry drone on hikes. Great value compared to others packs of this level. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the BEST DJI Backpacks out there!
customer_reviews.text: I travel cross country for several projects and want to pack as light as I can. This is a fantastic and hidden gem amongst DJI travel backpacks. I've probably purchased 2-3 of them over the last year, and returned them within the week. It fits my DSLRs, accessories, and most importantly DJI! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gatchalian

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Plenty of extra room for cables and such. It is comfortable and secure. I would definitely recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: IfItflys

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack, the original DJI foam box fits perfect in it
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It is well-designed and fits the Phantom foam case perfectly. The zippered lid has a special cutout for the case lock and the pack has plenty of room for batteries and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Marino

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: The top pocket is great for storage. Each divider has Velcro so it can be moved to fit how you want it. The main pocket holds the DJI case very well. The front pocket has lots of room to hold your stuff. The side pockets are ample as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to pack your Phanthom 4
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to pack your Phanthom 4. Takes advantage of the foam box the phanthom came in. Very clever. Well built, and plenty of space for batteries and monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag is big and bulky, mat as well just ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag is big and bulky, mat as well just carry the case, unfortunately it’s still sitting in the closet with the tags on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable.  Has enough compartments for all my phantom 4 gear
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable. Has enough compartments for all my phantom 4 gear
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Paz

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands drone. So you have to put the original case into this backpack. It works great, but kind or cheaply made. The straps are coming undone, with about 5 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: van7182000

customer_reviews.title: Fits good. I pad pocket should be bigger though
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. I pad pocket should be bigger though. I sont like keeping just the ipad in there without its box for the protection. Ipad cost to much to keep unprotected
customer_reviews.author: Erock (Erick)

customer_reviews.title: Styrofoam box Phantom 4 came in fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Styrofoam box Phantom 4 came in fit like a glove. Time will tell about durability. I am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: drpopp64

customer_reviews.title: bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: great backpack for the price but its a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.author: RFields

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for starters
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack. Everything you could wish to carry and protect your belongings, I was going to go for a more expensive pack, but this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Lusca

customer_reviews.title: Well designed backpack
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was specifically designed to work with the existing phantom four Styrofoam container it fits well and has plenty of extra storage for accessories I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Russell Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits like a glove very impressed plenty of room for accessories
customer_reviews.author: NLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag it's definitely what I needed for easy travel. A buddy of mine has a nice rolling hard case and he said he has to get one like this. I also like how I can lock the main compartments together.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Spike

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack for my Phantom 4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack for my Phantom 4 Pro. I've been using it for 6 months, and continue to be very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It all fits! 5 batteries, charger, drone and all!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. All my stuff fits in this back pack. It remains to be seen, how it will wear, but I have little doubt that this bag will work well for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buglione

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and affordable way to carry your phantom 4 drone
customer_reviews.author: Rey CJ

customer_reviews.title: wish it had a bit more pockets but good.
customer_reviews.text: this is a cheap backpack that has extra pockets for all the things you need mostly. wish it had a bit more pockets but good.
customer_reviews.author: krusty

customer_reviews.title: Have a Phantom 4 drone & need a backpack? Well here you go.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. I've used on the motorcycle a lot and it's holding up really well. Also love how the drone case fits.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cary case for factory shipping box
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, plenty of room for the original foam box with extra space for batteries and cables.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fits well, but you need the original packing from the factory
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L

customer_reviews.title: Discreet and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and very discreet,which is better for rapid and complicated missions.
customer_reviews.author: gauchofreak

customer_reviews.title: good shape and perfect to get inside a complete box ...
customer_reviews.text: On time, good shape and perfect to get inside a complete box with my Phantom!
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Medel

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I love the space the straps it all comes with its neat not made of cheap material durable. I put my nine inch sub with two speakers extension cords and more in it. Because my drone is on the way at it past the test.
customer_reviews.author: Isiah

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Nice & simple design using the existing case. Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.author: Max Charleswell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best large drone backpack
customer_reviews.text: Makes carrying all the equipment that comes with a larger drone so much easier and efficient. Made of strong and durable material makes this pack a Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Digler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this in two days. Fits my phantom 4 perfectly along with everything else I’ll need for a day of flying with it. So far so good. Will update if that changes 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Pauly Piñata

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for P4P Drones
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my P4P. Great quality. A must have for P4P drones
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Avoid it
customer_reviews.text: Fits well.... Horrible quality. I've used this once, to my car and back into my house and it has already torn at a seam.. horrible quality
customer_reviews.author: Sean A. Klechak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this back pack! It fits all my Phantom Pro 4 perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Also works great for carry on and fits in overhead storage with ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits the case perfectly! Also works great for carry on and fits in overhead storage with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: jason jansma

customer_reviews.title: Best accessory for phantom 4
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this everyday for 2 months. It is holding up very well. This is the best accessory to go with the phantom 4.
customer_reviews.author: Mtimb1981

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great fit with the DJI Styrofoam box. Battery compartment works well. Good storage compartment for the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.... I bought this as a carry on and it has worked well. The battery compartment is nice at security checks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Buell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I received it sooner than expected. It was a perfect fit for my Phantom 4p, like a glove and the extra space for the batteries IA a big plus
customer_reviews.author: onelac

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My drone survived two international flights as a check in luggage in these. Respect.
customer_reviews.author: plutonic

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what we were looking for with a drone business.
customer_reviews.author: Captgrwill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it if you want to make carrying your drone easier
customer_reviews.author: Immanuel Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well designed and light. Well worth the modest price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebelvis

customer_reviews.title: check product make sure is good
customer_reviews.text: I oder two pack batteries and one battery is not working, can you tell me how do I returned? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: JUAN R GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: awesome bag !
customer_reviews.text: just what I need - good quality fabric - perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Joe Tents

customer_reviews.title: Great phantom 4 pro backpack for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Not much to dislike. hold everthing and more. Well built
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come with a foam to put the drone away. It is a regular empty backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Willmar Mosquera

customer_reviews.title: Additional battery space up top is great. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything you need securely in the original styrofoam case. Additional battery space up top is great. Comfortable, light weight and easily manageable.
customer_reviews.author: John Besack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match!
customer_reviews.text: My son was delighted with this, and uses it whenever he goes somewhere with his drone. Excellent design!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost, Great Utility
customer_reviews.text: It fits as it says. This simple solution is low cost but ulility is rich.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a phantom 4 advanced this backpack is a perfect fit, holds my extra batteries, props, lenses ect with room to spare. Try one you Will Love It
customer_reviews.author: James D Dennis

customer_reviews.title: The thought of using the original case is great. Everything fits as explained and it is well ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built. The thought of using the original case is great. Everything fits as explained and it is well built.
customer_reviews.author: huntsterr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pack. Great idea to use the existing foam ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pack. Great idea to use the existing foam container that my P4 shipped in. Having the extra pockets just makes it that much more useful. The only thing I would suggest, is add even more pockets. there is a large one on the front part that zips around your foam case, but there seems room to add maybe an additional pocket above it.. maybe something like a smaller pen pocket, or something with dividers for smaller items such as filters, SD card packs etc.
customer_reviews.author: R. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and a very smart way to re-use the original case from the Phantom 4 Pro.

customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, in perfect condition and exactly as the described. Really good bag for the purpose & the price!
customer_reviews.author: Josh K.

product_meta.title: Smatree Hard Shell Backpack Compatible for DJI Phantom 4/4 Pro (Original Styrofoam Case, Phantom 4 Battery, Propellers Not Included)
feature_bullets: Large main compartment holds and protects Phantom 4 original styrofoam case. It features a rectangular hole to quickly unlock the styrofoam case which enables you conveniently open both the case and DP3000 backpack together.
A pocket on the backside of the main compartment leaves enough interior space for carrying around tablet(up to 9.7" iPad Air 2) or other mobile devices to sync with Phantom 4 remote control.
Upper back special compartment with its adjustable cells can load 4pcs batteries or be adjusted to accommodate your unique group of accessories.
Two external zippered pockets store a sufficient number of propellers to meet your needs while Phantom 4 drone in outdoor.

Custom design DP3000 backpack for DJI Phantom 4 users, provides a convenient way to safely transport your Phantom 4 drone and almost essentials. 【 NOTE: ①Original Styrofoam Case, Batteries, Propellers Are NOT Included for Sale. ②Backpack for DJI Phantom 4 / 4 Pro Only, NOT for DJI Phantom 3/2 】
